TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectListItemCollection extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ArrayListCollectionBase implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The class object provides the container for the items of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>. Accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Items%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> retrieves an ObjectListItemCollection object. Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection> class, an application cannot programmatically add or remove elements of this collection.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears the collection. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not available in the read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interface.
You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A> method for all the classes where this method applies. For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItemCollection.Clear%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>, it clears all the choices in the collection.
Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Returns the index of the specified item as an integer. If the specified field is not found, the IndexOf method returns -1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instructs the collection to track changes to its view state. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks After this method has been called, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property will return `true`. Also, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection> will be set to `true`.
